metadata.Title: CVE-2018-4700 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
** REJECT ** DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER. ConsultIDs: CVE-2018-4300. Reason: This candidate is a duplicate of CVE-2018-4300. Notes: All CVE users should reference CVE-2018-4300 instead of this candidate. All references and descriptions in this candidate have been removed to prevent accidental usage.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-4700` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

cups - 2.1.3-4ubuntu0.6
cups-bsd - 2.1.3-4ubuntu0.6
cups-client - 2.1.3-4ubuntu0.6
cups-common - 2.1.3-4ubuntu0.6
cups-core-drivers - 2.1.3-4ubuntu0.6
cups-daemon - 2.1.3-4ubuntu0.6
cups-ipp-utils - 2.1.3-4ubuntu0.6
cups-ppdc - 2.1.3-4ubuntu0.6
cups-server-common - 2.1.3-4ubuntu0.6
libcups2 - 2.1.3-4ubuntu0.6
libcupscgi1 - 2.1.3-4ubuntu0.6
libcupsimage2 - 2.1.3-4ubuntu0.6
libcupsmime1 - 2.1.3-4ubuntu0.6
libcupsppdc1 - 2.1.3-4ubuntu0.6
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: cups package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.1.3-4ubuntu0.6').
